about.content:
At Fanega Web Development, we design and develop modern SEO-friendly websites for small businesses, bloggers, fitness coaches, and anyone you can think of that needs a website! Our goal is to ensure our clients receive the best service in creating their dream websites.

If you are looking for a new website made from scratch, a current website that needs updating, or a small revision made, our developers and designers can help you out. With the world rapidly turning into the internet, now is the time to make your website stand out!

mobileFirstDesign.title: Mobile-First Design
mobileFirstDesign.content: I prioritize mobile user experience, starting design and development from small screens to large screens; known as “Mobile-First Design”

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.content: Applying the Mobile-First Design, your website will fully be responsive. It'll look amazing on your phone as well as on your computer screen.

optimized.title: Optimize
optimized.content: SEO is an important tool to bring in clients and customers. Apart from ads, I will ensure your website is optimized in Google's Search Engine.

examples.exerpt:
$500 to start a standard 5-page business or professional website. Custom features will be priced on the type of feature.

All external factors such as domain, hosting, emailing, and other fees using 3rd-Party software are not included.

simple.title: Simple HTML, JS, and CSS
simple.description: A simple website with no editing features or additional hosting cost.

pageBuilders.title: Page Builders
pageBuilders.description: Have a page builder already made? I can help you design better.

wordpress.title: Custom WordPress Theme
wordpress.description: A WordPress website focused on creating editable content.

wordpressHeadless.title: Headless WordPress
wordpressHeadless.description: A website with the benefits of both a CMS and SPA.

futureConnect.title: Future Connect, LLC
futureConnect.description: Headless CMS using Next.js and WordPress

leePorterFitness.title: Lee Porter Fitness
leePorterFitness.description: A simple website using HTML, JS, and CSS

deanllc.title: Law Offices of Gerardo L. Dean LLC

talaTherapy.title: Tala Therapy, LLC
talaTherapy.description: A simple website using HTML, JS, and CSS
